taskDescription: The polyurethane foam used for home insulation uses methanediphenyldiisocyanate (MDI) as monomer. The MDI is prepared by acid-catalyzed reaction of aniline with formaldehyde, followed by treatment with phosgene, COCl2. Propose mechanisms for both steps.
